lead_paragraph: ZUBRIN--Charles, passed away on Thursday, June 2nd, 2016. He was 100. Charlie was born in New York City and moved to Great Neck, NY in 1960. Upon retiring, he moved to Palm Beach, FL. Charlie worked for the Topps Company in New York for many years before retiring as Vice President. He was predeceased by his wife, Rosalyn who passed away in 1998, and survived by his son Robert Zubrin, daughter, Linda Zubrin Ratner, grandchildren Jessica, David and Rachel, and great granddaughters, Salem and Mirah. Charles lived life with song and joy. He was loved by so many. The funeral service is at 9:30am on Sunday, June 5th 2016 at Temple B'Nai Or. 60 Overlook Road, Morristown, NJ. Interment: Beth David Cemetery in Elmont, NY. Services are under the direction the Par-Troy Funeral Home. (973)887-3235 or visit www. partroyfuneralhome.com. 1/3
